subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Carl Edwards won the season-ending Ford 300 on Saturday, but came up 21 points short in his attempt to overtake Clint Bowyer and win his second straight Nascar Nationwide Series title.
snippet: Carl Edwards won the season-ending Ford 300 on Saturday, but came up 21 points short in his attempt to overtake Clint Bowyer and win his second straight Nascar Nationwide Series title.
